title: Hometown BR
name: Hometown BR
description:
A Map by Getbackhomeward

I was born and raised in Baton Rouge. For a long time, I thought every city looked like this sprawling suburb, filled with ranch houses. Luckily, I discovered the Garden District before I left. With its sprawling oak trees, it looks surprisingly like New Orleans. I'm happy to move on to more progressive places, but I'll always remember the little gems we had.

properties.name: Baton Rouge Little Theater
properties.description: Posted by Getbackhomeward  7155 Florida Blvd, Baton Rouge, LAI have seen my friends in countless plays here.

properties.name: Kamado's
properties.description: Posted by Getbackhomeward 4612 Bennington Ave, Baton Rouge, LAThe highest quality sushi in town. We have spent many a special occasion at the teppen grill as well.

properties.name: King Buffet
properties.description: Posted by Getbackhomeward 6230 Bluebonnet Blvd, Baton Rouge, LAI go here for the sushi. It\'s not as good as the original in New Orleans, because sometimes the sushi rice is hard, but it\'s just 0 for all you can eat. It seems to be a trend around here for Chinese buffets to have Japanese, Thai, etc.. as well. They have stuffed potatoes, boiled crawfish, raw oysters and crab legs. More un-Chinese food than actual Chinese food.

properties.name: Leo's Iceland
properties.description: Posted by Getbackhomeward1717 N Airway Dr, Baton Rouge, LAI had a birthday party here when I was in 8th or 9th grade as a throwback to the ever-popular rollerskating parties of elementary school. I\'m one of the few people in Baton Rouge to know how to ice skate thanks to this place.

properties.name: Rama
properties.description: Posted by Getbackhomeward 2919 Perkins Rd, Baton Rouge, LAA hip place for those in the know. B took me there my first time, and I was impressed. Their "specialty" is pad thai, which is funny because it\'s the classic Thai dish, but it really is the best I\'ve tasted. The Rama duck is good but a bit fatty and salty.

properties.name: Sicily's Ultimate Italian Buffet
properties.description: Posted by Getbackhomeward 7655 Andrea Drive, Baton Rouge, LA, 70809Sicily\'s Ultimate Italian Buffet

properties.name: The Great Wall
properties.description: Posted by Getbackhomeward 3132 College Dr, Baton Rouge, LAAnother yummy "Chinese" buffet featuring delicious snow crab rolls. I actually eat the Chinese food here, though. I love the Mongolian beef, mussels, and kung pao crawfish.

properties.name: The Runnels School
properties.description: Posted by System 17255 South Harrells Ferry Road, Baton Rouge, LA, 70816The Runnels School

properties.name: Unitarian Church
properties.description: Posted by Getbackhomeward8470 Goodwood Blvd, Baton Rouge, LA

properties.name: anahata yoga
properties.description: Posted by Getbackhomeward  2935 Perkins Rd, Baton Rouge, LASingle-serving yoga classes for a pop. Low-key, friendly instructors. The interior is remodeled, with a beautiful ballet-style laminate wood floor and wall-length mirror.
